description: This file provides functions for establishing a WebSocket connection for ping monitoring, including URL construction and connection handling with event callbacks.

methods.name: buildWsUrl(sessionId)
methods.description: Constructs a WebSocket URL based on session ID, environment variables, and window location, with support for explicit URLs and fallback to same-origin.

methods.name: connectPingStream({ sessionId, onMessage, onOpen, onClose, onError })
methods.description: Establishes a WebSocket connection to the ping stream, sets up event listeners for open, close, error, and message, and returns the socket and a disconnect function.

ctags.name: connectPingStream
ctags.pattern: /^export function connectPingStream({ sessionId, onMessage, onOpen, onClose, onError }) {$/
